title: Am I the only one who thinks this isn't okay?
body:
https://imageshack.com/a/img922/4976/CK3rAk.png

Yes, I know Bunny has over 1000 AD

But having an execute ult that can one shot the ADC and mid at full HP doesn't seem OK

EDIT: Wow I'm an idiot and did not give a video

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LtOTrxMfEOw

Go to 9:27 and you'll see what I mean

replies.body: He was **_36 and 4_**, and most of those champions were level 14 while he was level 18. The Ziggs was level 17. He was also full build. This will never happen. Also no one dodged his ult, which just gave him more ults.

> [{quoted}](name=Atrushan2,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EdWhx3vN,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-05-23T02:59:08.962+0000)
>
> He was **_36 and 4_**, and most of those champions were level 14 while he was level 18. The Ziggs was level 17. He was also full build. This will never happen. Also no one dodged his ult, which just gave him more ults.

Ya got a point there, but just sayin that if I saw THAT happen in my game I wouldn't be very happy

> [{quoted}](name=Lolman978,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EdWhx3vN,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2018-05-23T19:39:33.223+0000)
>
> Ya got a point there, but just sayin that if I saw THAT happen in my game I wouldn't be very happy

Agreed but at the same time if that happened in my game I'd be more upset that he was allowed to get to that point to begin with. You can't just nullify someone's damage when they're 36 and 4 and 4 levels over everyone on the team except one person that they're 1 level over while also being full build. You know everyone on the enemy team was also likely not even close to full build considering how far they let that Pyke take over the game. That's now something you should be balancing around at all. Context is important.
u gonna post a vid? a gif? anything other than a pic that doesn't show anything other than that he has over 1k AD

> [{quoted}](name=Too Unlucky,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EdWhx3vN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-05-22T20:44:27.178+0000)
>
> u gonna post a vid? a gif? anything other than a pic that doesn't show anything other than that he has over 1k AD

Whoops

I doubt that build would ever be viable in a real game.

And, anyways, once you hit 1k AD you're going to kill people pretty damn fast on anyone. Hell, a 1k AD Soraka would get a penta easily as well.

> [{quoted}](name=DuskDaUmbreon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EdWhx3vN,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-05-22T22:57:57.063+0000)
>
> I doubt that build would ever be viable in a real game.
> 
> And, anyways, once you hit 1k AD you're going to kill people pretty damn fast on anyone. Hell, a 1k AD Soraka would get a penta easily as well.

Yes, but the difference is that 
a. Armor will make no difference to Pyke since once they hit the threshold its a true damage execute and that threshold is determined by PYKE'S AD
b. Pyke can continuously blink from target to target
c. With Pyke's invisibility he can essentially flank the enemy team
d. The ult is an AoE, so clumped teams are screwed
